name: Flappy Bird Recreation v1.0
description:
It's a recreation of the 2013 game Flappy Bird by Dong Nguyen . In this game you "flap" through pipes endlessly. How long can you go?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

Mouse Pointer, Space Bar, Touch Screen.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 4 hours
